Andy MacNae
Standing to be Labour MP for Rossendale & Darwen
"My son goes to our local school, my wife is a health visitor and I am a local business owner.
I am running to be your MP at the next General Election because I want to tackle the challenges our community faces and put our home first.
The Conservatives have been in power for 13 years and in this time, hardworking people have had to foot the bill whilst public services fall apart.
As your MP, I will deliver the change we need in Rossendale. I will work to tackle the rising cost of living, improve our roads, protect our public services and create opportunities for hardworking people across our beautiful constituency.
Rossendale and Darwen deserves better than this Government.
It’s time for change".

-
